channel.title: [pi] help please!
channel.description:
I have a couple of questions
1. What is the Command Code to tele me somewhere (x,y) such as ::shops ? 2. Where would i find on the hybrid pvp base to change the xp given by imps from hunter ? 3. Where would i find to move an object on a PI? Such as a crate at the X,Y i want ?
Thanks for your help!! :rolleyes:

item.title: [pi] help please!
item.dc:creator: @xDizzay xDizzay
item.description:
@xDizzay wrote:

for teleing, the basic is:
if(command.StartsWith(“shops”)){
toX: (X COORD)
toY: (Y COORD)
}

or you could get technical and do:
if(command.StartsWith(“shops”)){
triggerTele(X COORD, Y COORD, FLOOR ITS ON);
brightness = 4;
}

this will make it look like you are using a tele spell out of the spellbook when you tele.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] help please!
item.dc:creator: @Scape-JAVA Scape-JAVA
item.description:
@Scape-JAVA wrote:

Npc.cfg (or something), and you’d change the coordinates E.g:

//------NpcID---CoordX--CoordY--Height--RangeX1-RangeY1-RangeX2-RangeY2-WalkType-Descrption spawn = 587 3292 3029 0 0 0 0 0 2 //Don't use this.
Under the X and Y coordinates is how you change where an NPC’s location is.

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] help please!
item.dc:creator: @lifezjoke lifezjoke
item.description:
@lifezjoke wrote:

where do i change an NPC"s location? :S

Read full topic

item.title: [pi] help please!
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

A simple command on a pi to move you somewere would be

if (playerCommand.startsWith("shops")) { c.getPA().movePlayer(XXXX, YYYY, 0); }

for number 2 maybe look in npchandler class or one of the npc classes im not sure, and for number 3 creating a object or deleting a object would be in src>server>world>objectmanager.java

hope i helped.

Read full topic
